DeleteDataForMeAndYou: Delete all the messages everyone has!
ConfirmListForMe: Are you sure you want to delete from the last chat will keep all the messages you can access at any time but will disappear from the last chat
ConfirmDataForMe: Are you sure you want to delete all messages in this chat, and you will delete them only with you, and your friend will be able to access them at any time
ConfirmDataForMeAndYou: Are you sure you want to delete all the messages in this chat at everyone's? After deleting, you will delete all the data you and your friend have and you will never be able to retrieve it again.
ConfirmDataAndListForMeAndYou: Are you sure that you want to delete everything? It will be deleted from the list of the last chat and all the messages you and your friend have will be deleted and you will not be able to retrieve them again
ConfirmOneMessageDataForMe: Are you sure you want to delete  this  message  just  you have ?
ConfirmOneMessageDataForMeAndYou: Are you sure you want to delete this message? It's going to be deleted. You have and your friend once and for all, and you can't get it back.
